msItem.note: Pub. status: Under research; contact institution

condition.ab: Big sheet of roll of mediocre quality; although the papyrus is badly damaged at the left and broken off at the right; the preserved part is in a very good condition; the text is well preserved and legible; it has the top and bottom margins; the papyrus was evenly folded at least 12 vertical times of 3.5 cm; it has numerous wormholes in three different patterns and positions: at the top, bottom and on the lower edge. The upper side has small wormholes; the lower side has bigger ones. There are two kolleses: one at the left side with overlap of 2.5 cm from the left edge; the second is ca. 14 cm from the right edge.

handDesc.p: Written along the fibers in two hands: first hand is medium-sized semi cursive; it used a thick nib the hand is slow and clear; this hand wrote the first three columns of the preserved text; the text in these columns is written in groups of lines with and interlinear space of ca. 1.5 cm as an average; second hand is medium-sized cursive; it used relatively thinner pen; the hand is fast and well practiced; this hand wrote column 4 and 5 of the preserved text; most of the lines of column 4 and some of column 5 have been marked with a checking mark.
